## geras.PathObject class

An object that handles creating and setting each of the SVG elements used by the renderer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PathObject extends BasePathObject 
```
**Extends:** [BasePathObject](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.md)

|  [(constructor)(root, style, constants)](./blockly.geras.pathobject._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>PathObject</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [colourDark](./blockly.geras.pathobject.colourdark.md) |  | string | The colour of the dark path on the block in '\#RRGGBB' format. |
|  [constants](./blockly.geras.pathobject.constants.md) |  | [ConstantProvider](./blockly.geras.constantprovider.md) |  |
